mapper.update: update onMeeting set onMeetName = #{onMeetName}, category = #{category}, introduction = #{introduction, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isPublic = #{isPublic}, onMeetingAddr = #{onMeetingAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateDate = sysdate where onMeetingIdx = #{onMeetingIdx}
mapper.sql: SELECT distinct meet.*, (SELECT memberIdx FROM onMeetingMem WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx AND isHost = '1') as hostIdx, (SELECT memberName FROM onMeetingMem mem JOIN member m ON mem.memberIdx = m.memberIdx WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx AND isHost = '1') as hostName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM onMeetingMem WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx) as memberCnt FROM onMeeting meet
mapper.select: SELECT distinct meet.*, mem.joinDate, (SELECT memberIdx FROM onMeetingMem WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx AND isHost = '1') as hostIdx, (SELECT memberName FROM onMeetingMem mem JOIN member m ON mem.memberIdx = m.memberIdx WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx AND isHost = '1') as hostName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM onMeetingMem WHERE onMeetingIdx = meet.onMeetingIdx) as memberCnt FROM onMeeting meet JOIN onMeetingMem mem ON meet.onMeetingIdx = mem.onMeetingIdx JOIN member m ON mem.memberIdx = m.memberIdx where m.memberIdx = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY mem.joinDate desc
